column5: Signatures must not be larger than 75 pixels high AND 500 pixels wide. Please, the rules are: "One image in a signature is allowed. Images in signatures must not be greater than 500 pixels wide and 75 pixels in height. Signature images must not be more than 100K in file size." This number was not just pulled out of a hat. There's a reason for it. It's getting out of hand now. Please check the size of your sigatures and adjust them to comply with this simple rule. Thanks folks.

Hey Roy may be beneficial to explain how someone can check there sig to see if it complies. I know I wouldn't know how to check accurately. Maybe a pointer or two to send people in the right direction.  My 2cents
Thanks for the reminder Roy.....I'll have the guy who designed our tourney logo reduce the size.....as we were all linking to it.
....Right click on the image, then select "properties".
Spiel should me that a few weeks back thanks again for the heads up
If you're trying to visualize 500x75, here's an example:

Roy you should pin this thread.  our banner is 9 pix too high. i will change it. width and file size are fine though
If your image is too big guys, you can download image re-sizer on microsoft website. Its easy to use and it can shrink your image to couple of different sizes.
